amendment.description: Amendment clarifies requirements on reverse mortgages for seniors who own permanent foundation homes on leased land.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-330 to clarify requirements on reverse mortgages for seniors who own permanent foundation homes on leased land.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Bishop (NY).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
